name: Pick King
description:
Game Description:

You are the cyan square, and your enemy can be different geometric shapes. Everyone has different, random starting statistics, for example: Health Point, Shield, Damage. Every round you must pick a side, what will increase, or decrease this stats. After that you hp will decrease by the amount of enemys damage, and so on.

Credits:

  • Game made by Szenos, by a hungarian game developer.
  • Music made in: https://ecrettmusic.com/ website
